channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Access Manager Appliance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Access Manager Appliance

item.title: CVE-2018-1804|2024-09-17T04:08:52.255Z -- ibm -- security%20access%20manager%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Appliance 9.0.1.0, 9.0.2.0, 9.0.3.0, 9.0.4.0, and 9.0.5.0 does not set the secure attribute on authorization tokens or session cookies. This could allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 149703.

item.title: CVE-2019-4725|2024-09-17T02:11:53.549Z -- ibm -- security%20access%20manager%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Appliance 9.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 172131.

item.title: CVE-2018-1886|2024-09-17T02:57:54.868Z -- ibm -- security%20access%20manager%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Appliance 9.0.1.0, 9.0.2.0, 9.0.3.0, 9.0.4.0, and 9.0.5.0 discloses sensitive information to unauthorized users. The information can be used to mount further attacks on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 152021.

item.title: CVE-2020-4395|2024-09-17T00:52:22.785Z -- ibm -- security%20access%20manager%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Appliance 9.0.7 does not invalidate session after logout which could allow an authenticated user to impersonate another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 179358.

item.title: CVE-2018-1653|2024-09-17T01:21:32.639Z -- ibm -- security%20access%20manager%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Appliance 9.0.1.0, 9.0.2.0, 9.0.3.0, 9.0.4.0, and 9.0.5.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 144726.

item.title: CVE-2018-1814|2024-09-17T04:20:32.813Z -- ibm -- security%20access%20manager%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Appliance 9.0.1.0, 9.0.2.0, 9.0.3.0, 9.0.4.0, and 9.0.5.0 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 150018.

item.title: CVE-2018-1887|2024-09-17T01:26:54.643Z -- ibm -- security%20access%20manager%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Appliance 9.0.1.0, 9.0.2.0, 9.0.3.0, 9.0.4.0, and 9.0.5.0 contains hard-coded credentials, such as a password or cryptographic key, which it uses for its own inbound authentication, outbound communication to external components, or encryption of internal data. IBM X-Force ID: 152078.

item.title: CVE-2018-1740|2024-09-17T02:42:36.171Z -- ibm -- security%20access%20manager%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Appliance 9.0.1.0, 9.0.2.0, 9.0.3.0, 9.0.4.0, and 9.0.5.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 148419.
